> Hey,  >  > Thanks for the contribution, this is awesome. > As you may have read, project members have somehow an opinionated view on what and how should be > Mockito, e.g. we don't want mockito to be a feature bloat. > There may be a thorough review, with feedback -> code change loop. >  > Which branch :  > - On mockito 3.x, make your pull request target `release/3.x` > - On mockito 2.x, make your pull request target `release/2.x` (2.x is in maintenance mode) > > _This block can be removed_ > _Something wrong in the template fix it here `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md`
